item.title: Obtain index
item.description: Download and extract the test files zip from http://www.eclipse.org/eclipse/platform-ua/testing/test_files.zip

item.title: Install plugins
item.description: Extract the /help/org.eclipse.help.index.test.zip and place the test plugin in your plugins dir; restart workbench

item.title: Test Index View
item.description: Run some tests on the index view in the webapp.

subitem.label: Verify that there’s a new index tab at the bottom left. Click on it to open the index.
Verify that there is a text box with a DISPLAY button to the right and that there is a list of keywords.
Verify that when you start to type in a word in the index that entry is selected.
Open a topic by clicking on the link.

item.title: Test Index in Help View
item.description: Repeat the tests using the help view

subitem.label: Verify that there’s a new index tab at the bottom left. Click on it to open the index.
Verify that there is a text box with a DISPLAY button to the right and that there is a list of keywords.
Verify that when you start to type in a word in the index that entry is selected.
Open a topic by clicking on the link.
Select an index entry. Check that the type in area shows the selected keyword.
